question: How does the variant PIK3CA Mutation affect response to Trastuzumab in Breast Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'PIK3CA Mutation'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Trastuzumab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Trastuzumab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Trastuzumab')
)
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Breast')
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('MEK Inhibitor RO4987655')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('MEK Inhibitor RO4987655'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('MEK Inhibitor RO4987655')
)
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Colorectal')
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Thioguanine')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Thioguanine'))

)
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('B-lymphoblastic Leukemia/lymphoma')

  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,

  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'FGFR1 Amplification OR FGFR2 Amplification OR FGFR3 Amplification OR FGFR4 Amplification'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Erdafitinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Erdafitinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Erdafitinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Cancer')
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

placeholders.variant_name: FGFR1 Amplification OR FGFR2 Amplification OR FGFR3 Amplification OR FGFR4 Amplification

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Abiraterone')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Abiraterone'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Abiraterone')
)
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Castration-resistant Prostate Carcinoma')
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'TPR TPR::NTRK1 Fusion'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Larotrectinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Larotrectinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Larotrectinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma')
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'BRAF V600E'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Trametinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Trametinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Trametinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Gastrointestinal Neuroendocrine Tumor')
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

  v.name AS variant_name,

  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
